Title: The Tale of Iya
Writer: TetsuichirÃ´ Tsuta (screenplay), Masaya Kawamura (screenplay), Masayuki Ueda (screenplay)
Actors: Rina Takeda, Shima Ohnishi, Min Tanaka, Hitoshi Murakami
Plot: As a tunnel construction project threatens the natural order of one of Japan's last untouched regions, an old man and his granddaughter Haruna's humble lifestyle begins to influence the outlook of a man from Tokyo.
